warning.lang: We apologize for any inconvenience. We are working on the translations, and in case there are any mistakes, please note that we are using artificial intelligence to assist us in this process. Thank you for your understanding.

seo.title: Premium Colombian Fruit Export
seo.description: Leading supplier of tropical and exotic fruits from Colombia. We offer high-quality fresh fruits for importers and distributors in the USA, Europe and Asia.

hero.title: The Taste of Colombia
hero.subtitle:
Limón Tahití
to the World
hero.description: We bring the vibrant taste of Colombia’s Limón Tahití to every corner of the globe. Each lime is cultivated with passion and exported with pride.

stats.title: Why Choose Tropifresh Limón Tahití?
stats.subtitle: Grown with passion and exported with pride

items.title: Global Export
items.description: Our Limón Tahití cross borders, bringing the best of Colombia straight to your door, without losing an ounce of freshness.

items.title: Certified Quality
items.description: We hold the ICA certification from Colombia, ensuring our limes meet the highest international standards.

items.title: Unmatched Flavor
items.description: The perfect balance of acidity and sweetness, ideal for turning any recipe into a culinary masterpiece.

items.title: Year-Round Availability
items.description: No matter the season, you'll always have access to our fresh limes because at Tropifresh, quality knows no off-season.

our-story.title: From Our Farm to Your Grocer
our-story.subtitle: Our Story
our-story.description: We’re proud to be pioneers in maritime fruit export, opening new doors for Colombia’s agricultural industry. Behind every lime is our commitment to sustainability, supporting farming communities, and protecting our beautiful environment.

items.message: Tropifresh's Limón Tahití are simply the best I’ve ever tasted. Their freshness and flavor really stand out in any dish. Highly recommended!
items.author: Carla M.

items.message: Our cocktails have never been better. These limes are the star of our drinks.
items.author: Javier G.

call-to-action.title:
Ready to Bring Freshness to
Your Business?
call-to-action.description: Don’t wait any longer! Fill out the form below and start enjoying the best Tahiti lime from Colombia. Our team is ready to help you make your products extraordinary.

seo.title: Premium Colombian Fruit Export
seo.description: Leading supplier of tropical and exotic fruits from Colombia. We offer high-quality fresh fruits for importers and distributors in the USA, Europe and Asia.

hero.title: The Sweetest Taste of Colombia:
hero.subtitle:
Mango
de Azúcar
hero.description: We bring the rich, mouthwatering flavor of Colombia’s sugar mangoes to every corner of the globe. Grown with care and shipped with pride, our mangoes are a tropical experience in every bite.

exporting.title: Our Global Footprint
exporting.subtitle: Bringing Colombia's Freshness to the World
exporting.description: Discover how our premium mangoes connect continents. From the sunny plantations of Colombia to the most demanding markets around the world, each destination represents a promise of quality and flavor.

informative.title: Excellence at Every Stage
informative.subtitle: Discover the pillars of our quality

items.title: Selected Farms
items.description: We partner with carefully chosen Colombian farms, where each mango is cultivated with dedication and sustainable practices.

items.title: Quality Certifications
items.description: Our processes meet the highest international standards, backed by certifications that guarantee excellence.

items.title: Premium Products
items.description: We offer top-quality mangoes, rigorously selected to ensure the best flavor, texture, and freshness in every shipment.

items.title: Colombian Agricultural Institute
items.description: We adhere to ICA regulations, ensuring top quality and safety. Our PTO USA and EU certifications guarantee compliance with US and EU market standards, including traceability and quality requirements.

items.title: Global G.A.P. (in process)
items.description: This certification supports our responsible farming practices, ensuring food safety and sustainability across all our farms.

seo.title: Premium Colombian Fruit Export
seo.description: Leading supplier of tropical and exotic fruits from Colombia. We offer high-quality fresh fruits for importers and distributors in the USA, Europe and Asia.

hero.title: We export the juiciest fruit
hero.subtitle: Committed to Our People and Our Land
hero.description: At TropiFresh, we partner with local farmers in Colombia to create opportunities and support sustainable growth. Every fruit we export reflects our dedication to the community and social responsibility.

stats.title: From the field to your warehouse
stats.subtitle: Relevant facts

items.title: Farmer Network

items.title: Direct job creation

exporting.title: EXPORT FRUITS WITH US!
exporting.subtitle: Our Global Footprint
exporting.description: We export fruit across more than 15 destinations, connecting continents by bringing the rich culture and authentic flavors of Colombia to international markets. Each shipment reflects our commitment to quality, sharing a taste of Colombia with the world.

informative.title: Excellence at Every Stage
informative.subtitle: Discover the pillars of our quality

items.title: Our Packing Facility
items.description: Located in Santa Marta, we use cutting-edge technology to ensure each fruit is carefully selected, washed, and classified for optimal freshness and quality.

items.title: Our Farmers
items.description: Meet our farming legends. Our certified partnerships allow us to provide the highest quality and sustainability. Quality fruit, happy farmers and a lot of heart!

items.title: Certifications
items.description: We're on a certification spree. Because our fruits should come with a stamp of high quality.

items.title: ICA ( Colombian Agricultural Institute)
items.description: We adhere to ICA regulations, ensuring top quality and safety, including traceability and quality requirements.

items.title: Global GAP (in process)
items.description: This certification supports our responsible farming practices, ensuring food safety and sustainability across all our farms.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Your next partner is just a message away
contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to address your inquiries and specific needs. Contact us today and discover how we can be your ideal partner in importing premium Colombian fruits.

success.title: Thank you for reaching out!
success.description: We will get back to you shortly.
